A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's the worst Star Wars movie out of the entire saga and it shifts away from the direction of the other films as a whole. May be a great movie for non Star Wars fans and children but other than there's not much to see. Like it's been said in other online media outlets\, it has great visuals and a strong name but forced inclusions of characters and group representations and an incoherent and inconsistent plot with with either loopholes or unrelated continuity.
